attributes.action: Invoke Article 50 NOW! Get us out of the EU!
attributes.additional_details:
Sign the petition to get Cameron to Invoke Article 50 NOW! Britain OUT!
Junker doesn't want to wait and neither do I
attributes.background:
Cameron wants next PM to Invoke Article 50, likely sometime in October. Junker says Why wait? If you're out, you're out. No need to wait until October" (AND I AGREE!GET US OUT NOW!)
The sooner he does, the sooner we are free from the shackles of Brussels!
